data.message: How about instead of making stickers about foxes, you eliminate top stories completely and show every single friend's posts on my feed as they post them... instead of only showing a small percentage of friends posts from yesterday, then six hours ago, then two days ago, then ten minutes ago, etc when I already have recent stories selected? This is getting ridiculous.

replies.message: Suis d'accors
1000% agree.  I have absolutely NO DESIRE to read what Facebook deems a "top story."  It's time to move on!!

people read different stories at different rates so the actions or reactions will likely be recorded chaotically , does that seem like it's plausible?, i thought i had a good line on it until i started typing

It's not even reactions to posts, there is a significant chunk of my friends whose posts I do not get to see on my feed unless I go to each of their profiles individually. There are posts showing up that definitely do not make sense chronologically, and do not have recent comments to 'excuse' their popping up intermittently in between actual recent posts. How is that a good idea?
Have ya'll considered changing your news feed to most recent instead of top stories?
that's what I do.... I've set mine to most recent and so then I see more of my friends post....
Fun fact: Sometimes it resets and keeps going back to Top Stories.
exactly Krys! I never set mine to Top stories but more often than not that's where it is when I long on--so freakin' irritating!

Anna and Melissa, my news feed is always set to Most Recent, as I stated in my original comment. "instead of only showing a small percentage of friends posts from yesterday, then six hours ago, then two days ago, then ten minutes ago, etc WHEN I ALREADY HAVE RECENT STORIES SELECTED" 

I do not know how to make myself any clearer. This isn't about changing it from Top Stories to Recent Stories, my feed is already set to Recent Stories and my issue is based on already knowing simple things like that.
I think what were all trying to really figure out is what did the Fox say...
No, not at all, unless the fox can say why Facebook news feeds are so terribly configured hahaha
totally agree  The news feed is ridiculous :(
or you could get a hobby
Hey! Don't blame it on the foxes!

Maybe it's time to, "Move out of the land of big blue thumbs." That sticker series looks prophetic.

Of course, I say that, but I'll still be here in a month. I might use it less and less over time, and I might search a little harder for another site that fills the void, but I'll be here for a while.
What r u saying ? if u got something to say about my son u may want to talk to his parents first
compaining about facebook on facebook ... priceless.
Sent by the possible addition I am prohibited please
I thought it was just me getting post from yesterday or a week, etc. ago Don't want foxes, :(
I agree.
I'm just not smart enough to start the next craze!!!!!!!!lol
but I like the fox stickers :(
agreeed
fox stickers??? how dumb... and there was abundant wi-fi  so let me have my fox babies now.... really? wow..... so lame.
Annoys me that I keep clicking Most recent & it keepsoing back to top stories
